${ModID}:OlexasCloak.NAME: Olexa's Cloak
${ModID}:OlexasCloak.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL After !hoard! more {!hoard!|1= play|>1= plays}, gain !B! Block. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:HuttsGamble.NAME: Hutts' Gamble
${ModID}:HuttsGamble.DESCRIPTION: If you receive no unblocked attack damage this turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card next turn.
${ModID}:HuttsGamble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you receive no unblocked attack damage this turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card next turn.

${ModID}:Tricky.NAME: Tricky
${ModID}:Tricky.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card drawn this turn.

${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.NAME: Sneakyteak Strike
${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a *Darkside *Slap on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a *Darkside *Slap+ on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Retromation.NAME: Retromation
${ModID}:Retromation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a card from a Pack not available in your draft. NL It gains Ethereal.

${ModID}:OddOne.NAME: Odd One
${ModID}:OddOne.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Odd: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL ${ModID}:Even: Draw a card.

${ModID}:Frostprime.NAME: Frost Prime
${ModID}:Frostprime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Frost and apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BaalorBash.NAME: Baalorlord's Bash
${ModID}:BaalorBash.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unnate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Comfy *Blueprint to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BaalorBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Comfy *Blueprint to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BaalorBlueprint.NAME: Comfy Blueprint
${ModID}:BaalorBlueprint.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Put *The *Cozy *Chair on the bottom of it. Exhaust.
